Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Reroute at 71st/Jeffrey
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffrey, 73rd, Stony island, 67th and Jeffrey due to, street blockage near 71st/Jeffrey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffrey, 73rd, Stony island, 67th and Jeffrey due to, street blockage near 71st/Jeffrey.

Allow extra travel time.
